original_solution_mapping.L1: Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is 10-3=<<10-3=7>>7 trumpets.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Two more guitars than he has hands is 2+2=<<2+2=4>>4 guitars.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Two more trombones than he has heads is 2+1=<<2+1=3>>3 trombones.
original_solution_mapping.L4: And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is 4-1=<<4-1=3>>3 French horns.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2163.
    Returns: the total number of musical instruments Miles owns.
    """
    # L1
    fingers = 10 # WK
    fewer_trumpets = 3 # three fewer trumpets
    num_trumpets = fingers - fewer_trumpets

    # L2
    hands = 2 # WK
    more_guitars = 2 # two more guitars
    num_guitars = hands + more_guitars

    # L3
    heads = 1 # WK
    more_trombones = 2 # two more trombones
    num_trombones = more_trombones + heads

    # L4
    fewer_french_horn = 1 # one fewer French horn
    num_french_horns = num_guitars - fewer_french_horn

    # L5
    total_instruments = num_trumpets + num_guitars + num_trombones + num_french_horns

    # FA
    answer = total_instruments
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is {fingers}-{fewer_trumpets}=<<{fingers}-{fewer_trumpets}={num_trumpets}>>{num_trumpets} trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is {hands}+{more_guitars}=<<{hands}+{more_guitars}={num_guitars}>>{num_guitars} guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is {more_trombones}+{heads}=<<{more_trombones}+{heads}={num_trombones}>>{num_trombones} trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is {num_guitars}-{fewer_french_horn}=<<{num_guitars}-{fewer_french_horn}={num_french_horns}>>{num_french_horns} French horns.
